t: Herman's Hermits - The Very Best Of Herman's Hermits - Amazon.com Music
s: Herman's Hermits were what they were, to me representative of more blissful times (ignorance being bliss). So, I must remember when playing this CD to abandon all personal history that has followed -- and just go back in time. Then we'll all be young again, and the music will sound as fresh as ever.

s: I believe Derek Leckenby, Karl ... this CD was made, and the guitar and drum playing is excellent, evoking memories of the glory days of the group.
